snippet.title: GTA LC01 Lore #3: Claude's Legacy
snippet.description:
Step into the shadows of Liberty City with Claude, the silent but deadly enforcer. Watch as he claws his way from the gritty underbelly to the pinnacle of the criminal empire, proving that in this ruthless city, only those who break the rules rise to power. Experience the journey of a man who stops at nothing, where every heist, betrayal, and showdown is a testament to the dark truth: crime does pay.

All clips feature real gameplay from within the Liberty City 2001 Total Conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto 3.
Certain effects and audio have been dramatized for cinematic effect.
Certain scenes are not part of the game, but rather an extension of it for added lore.

Created by Luigi's Club, honouring Rockstar's classic.

https://gtaforums.com/topic/983493-grand-theft-auto-liberty-city-01/

Trailer credits
Editing: DoctorMike
Footage: Matt1010 & Sergiu C.
Writing: DoctorMike
